snippet.title: Asterogues - Official Trailer | Re-MIX Showcase July 2023
snippet.description:
Here's your look at action-packed gameplay and bullet hell chaos in this trailer for Asterogues, an upcoming cosmic bullet hell shoot-em-up hybrid game where you beat up planets. In Asterogues, pick your character from a band of outcasts banished to the Asteroid Belt, dodge and shoot your way through a brutal onslaught of bullets, and take revenge against the Solar System.

#Gaming
